name: Jeo Carlo Lubao
aboutMe: Jeo is a passionate software developer. Skilled in technologies like Svelte, Mobile Development (Android and Flutter), and Firebase. He actively contributes to the tech community, volunteering at tech communities in Davao City, while also working on personal side projects like creating VSCode color themes, websites and mobile apps. Dedicated to continuous learning, Jeo regularly attends local tech meetups to explore new concepts and enhance his skills. Outside tech stuff, he enjoys playing video games, watching anime, and playing musical instruments

roleDescription: Creating personal projects for skill enhancement and actively contributing to Free and Open Source Software (FOSS) projects on GitHub, driven by a passion for open source and continuous learning.
Enhanced user experience and functionality of a business consultancy services app.
Developed a freelancing platform for Medical Professionals, focusing on accessibility and functionality.
As creatives head, I specialized in creating esports-related publication materials for the HCDC Esports Club.
featuredEvents: HCDC Esports Club Pokemon Unite Tournament 2021

roleDescription: During my tenure as an officer at HCDC – College of Engineering and Technology Students Organization (HCDC – CETSO), I volunteered to use my graphic design skills to create compelling publication materials for social media platforms.

By actively contributing my skills and expertise in graphic design, I significantly contributed to the success of these events by creating engaging publication materials for social media. This helped promote the events effectively and enhance the online presence of the organization.

description.long_description: (Under Development) The PocketbaseExtended library facilitates smooth integration between Arduino projects and PocketBase, an open-source backend solution. PocketBase encompasses an embedded SQLite database with real-time subscriptions, integrated authentication management, a user-friendly dashboard UI, and a straightforward REST-ish API. By using the PocketbaseExtended library, developers can effortlessly connect their Arduino devices to the feature-rich PocketBase platform, streamlining real-time data processing and communication. Simplify your IoT projects with the seamless integration provided by the PocketbaseExtended library.

(Under Development) FlutterDex is set to become an exceptional Pokedex app powered by Flutter and integrated with PokeAPI. This ambitious project aims to deliver a seamless and visually appealing experience for Pokemon enthusiasts, offering comprehensive details about Pokemon, their abilities, and evolutions.

description.short_description: Svelte Anime Website using Jikan API
description.long_description: AniSvelte is an exciting project in the works, combining the power of Svelte with the Jikan API to create a feature-rich anime website. This project aims to replicate the functionalities of MyAnimeList (MAL) as a website to browse otaku-related content.

description.short_description: Davao City Student Portal Status Page
description.long_description: Project DESTINY is an unofficial, open-source Uptime Status Page designed to monitor the availability of critical educational websites in Davao City. This initiative aims to provide real-time information about the uptime status of key online platforms to ensure a seamless online learning experience for students.

HCDC True Site is an unofficial, open-source Uptime Status Page dedicated to monitoring the uptime of key Holy Cross of Davao College websites. This project is written in Svelte and uses SvelteKit as its meta-framework. This project is the predecessor of Project DESTINY

description.short_description: UI/UX design concept for an Augmented Reality interior design app
description.long_description: ARRange is a visually stunning UI/UX design concept for an Augmented Reality interior design app, created with Adobe XD. Immerse yourself in an intuitive and aesthetically pleasing interface that revolutionizes the E-Commerce experience. Explore the future of interior design effortlessly with ARRange's innovative design and user-friendly navigation.

description.short_description: An IoT-based First Responder App for Firemen
description.long_description: FireTracker, an Android app for firefighters, utilizes IoT, Java, and Kotlin for early fire detection and real-time data processing with Firebase. Integrated with Mapbox for precise navigation and SMS capabilities for automated notifications, the app enhances coordination and communication within firefighting teams, optimizing emergency response efforts.

description.short_description: A simple ecommerce Android app using SQLite
description.long_description: Netrunners is a mobile computer hardware store that retails computer hardware and other consumer electronics. It sells different kinds of hardware from well-known hardware manufacturers of motherboards, computer processors, graphics cards, storage devices, and more.

description.short_description: A Speech-to-Text (STT) note-taking app using SQLite
description.long_description: VoiceNotes is a user-friendly Speech-to-Text app that effortlessly converts spoken words into written notes. With the simplicity of SQLite, your transcribed thoughts are securely stored and easily accessible. Streamline your note-taking experience with Voice Notes for efficient and organized voice-to-text functionality.

description.short_description: A Java-based GUI educational tool for learning binary encoding
description.long_description: Binary Game is a Java-based GUI educational tool, utilizing Java Swing to teach the principles of the binary number system. Dive into an interactive experience, navigating challenges that make learning binary encoding both engaging and accessible. With its user-friendly interface, Binary Game is designed to simplify the understanding of binary numbers for learners of all levels.
